mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo(photono, photoname, photoalt, photothumb, photosize, filmno) VALUES (photo_seq.nextval, #{photoname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoalt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photothumb, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photosize, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filmno, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT photono, photoname, photoalt, photothumb, photosize, filmno FROM photo ORDER BY photono ASC, filmno DESC
